subject: unit testing message driven beans
msgSnippet: It seems to me that it is quite hard to test MDB s as they are asyncronous. Has anyone got any stratagies for unit testing them? Or possibly, do you think that
messageBody:
It seems to me that it is quite hard to test MDB's as they are
asyncronous. Has anyone got any stratagies for unit testing them? Or
possibly, do you think that they shouldn't be unit tested at all, only
tested at the functional/system testing level.
